QuestData.Title: Unprofitable Ventures
QuestData.Description:
This land is already a monumental disaster, but it could get worse!
The Venture Company is here, and will exploit this land for every ounce of profit they can make. We must make their venture here unprofitable, so they will leave.
Destroy the three expensive security units with them, and they may leave for more profitable ventures.
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy Pummeller Red, Pummeller Orange, and Pummeller Grey
